channel.title: Packet size
channel.description:
ok well i'm working on full smithing for my server and i have it all added but its to large to add with Object on item is there any way we could increase a packet size?
Using deltascape

item.title: Packet size
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

Alright, but how would I go about adding in the other class/method? I’m a fairly nub coder.

Read full topic

item.title: Packet size
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Handle each packet in a separate class or method.
You’re handling too much crap in one method.

Read full topic

item.title: Packet size
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

What gothy boy here means is that we’re updating Crafting, instead of it being you cut a gem and get an Amulet, you cut the uncut gem using a Chisel, you get an Cut Gem, you then use a Gold Bar on a furnace while you have a gem and a certain mold (Ring, Amulet or Necklace mold) and you get that type of item (already pre-enchanted), so like say… You cut a sapphire, you then use a Gold Bar on a Furnace with a Sapphire & an Amulet Mold in your iventory, it will delete the Sapphire/Gold Bar and give you an Amulet of Magic.

The only problem with this, is that the Item on Object packet is too large if I added all of this into it, meaning I need to increase the limit of the packet size.

Read full topic
